1.definition: an official responsible (as to a court) for correspondence, records, and accounts and having specified powers or authority (as to issue writs) [a city ] [ of court]

2 a.definition: a person employed to keep records or accounts or to perform general office work

sub_terms.b: a person (as a law student or graduate) employed by an attorney or judge to assist with case-related tasks (as research) compare

clerkÂ·shipn.definition: vito act or work as a clerk [for a Supreme Court justice]
